data.text:
Looking to travel from Bergamo to Lodi by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 1 hour 45 minutes to travel from Bergamo to Lodi by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 1 hour 19 minutes though. You'll usually find 32 trains per day running along the 28 miles (45 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 1 change during the journey to Lodi, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. Trains on this route are usually operated by either Frecciarossa or Trenitalia. On board you'll find modern comfortable seating and plenty of room for luggage as standard.

Plan your trip ahead of time and book early if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Tickets from Bergamo to Lodi start from €8.00 when you book in advance, so use our Journey Planner to view the latest prices.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Lodi by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
